<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 1, you enter the kitchen.</s> <s>This room is shaped like the lower-left quarter of an octagon, which is a shape with eight sides.</s> <s>Immediately to your right is HAND WASH STATION 1.</s> <s>Against the diagonal wall to your left are a row of OVENS and a GRILL.</s> <s>Where the diagonal wall ends is DOOR 2, with HAND WASH STATION 2 to its right.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a large PREP STATION, next to which is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>On the ceiling above the prep station is a CAMERA.</s> <s>When you look up at it, you also notice a number of SPRINKLERS on the ceiling.</s> <s>At the opposite end of the room is DOOR 3, with a long COUNTER to the right of it and a large REFRIGERATOR to its left.</s> <s>On the wall above the counter is a MONITOR.</s> <s>On the wall to your right are a number of SINKS, above which are some CUPBOARDS, and further back along the wall is a large COOLER DOOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 3, you enter the kitchen.</s> <s>This room is shaped like the upper-right quarter of an octagon, which is a shape with eight sides.</s> <s>Immediately to your right is a large REFRIGERATOR.</s> <s>On the wall to your right is DOOR 2, with HAND WASH STATION 2 to its right.</s> <s>On the diagonal wall across from you are a GRILL and a row of OVENS.</s> <s>Where the diagonal wall ends is DOOR 1, with HAND WASH STATION 1 to its left.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a large PREP STATION, next to which is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>On the ceiling above the prep station is a CAMERA.</s> <s>When you look up at it, you also notice a number of SPRINKLERS on the ceiling.</s> <s>Immediately to your left is a long COUNTER, with a MONITOR on the wall above it.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is a large COOLER DOOR, with a number of SINKS, above which are some CUPBOARDS, to the right of it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Emerging from the COOLER DOOR, you return to the kitchen.</s> <s>The room is shaped like the upper-left quarter of an octagon, which is a shape with eight sides.</s> <s>Immediately to your left is a number of SINKS, above which are some CUPBOARDS.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is DOOR 1, with HAND WASH STATION 1 to its left.</s> <s>Against the diagonal wall across from you are a row of OVENS and a GRILL.</s> <s>Where the diagonal wall ends is DOOR 2, with HAND WASH STATION 2 to its right.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a large PREP STATION, next to which is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>On the ceiling above the prep station is a CAMERA.</s> <s>When you look up at it, you also notice a number of SPRINKLERS on the ceiling.</s> <s>On the wall to your right is a long COUNTER with a MONITOR on the wall above it.</s> <s>At the end of the counter is DOOR 3, with a large REFRIGERATOR further back along the wall.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming through DOOR 1, cold air washes over you as you enter the cooler.</s> <s>The FANS are rather loud.</s> <s>The room feels a little cramped, with both the left and back walls lined with SHELVES and ROLLING CARTS, stacked with boxes and containers.</s> <s>On the right wall is DOOR 2, with a <if cond="findPuzzle('ICE', 'cooler').solved === false">frozen over</if> BAR LOCK on it.</s> <s>On the middle of the ceiling is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge from DOOR 2, which is fitted with a BAR LOCK.</s> <s>The temperature isn't nearly as cold as the freezer, but is still considerably chilly.</s> <s>The FANS are also a bit quieter.</s> <s>The room feels just as cramped, however, with both the back and right walls lined with SHELVES and ROLLING CARTS, stacked with boxes and containers.</s> <s>On the left wall is DOOR 1, above which is a MONITOR on the wall.</s> <s>There is a CAMERA on the ceiling in the middle of the room.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the large DOOR and... brrr!</s> <s>It's freezing in here!</s> <s>The FANS in here are even louder than the ones in the cooler.</s> <s>The room is cramped, with very little space to walk around.</s> <s>There are icicles hanging from various parts of the ceiling.</s> <s>On your right are several rows of SHELVES.</s> <s>To your left are a few PALLETS.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a TRAP DOOR.</s> <s>On the middle of the ceiling is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s> <s>It's way too cold in here.</s> <s>You shouldn't stay here for long.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from the only DOOR, you enter the fitness room.</s> <s>This is a very wide room with a slanted right wall.</s> <s>Taking up much of the space in the middle of the room is a bloodstained YOGA MAT.</s> <s>Against the left wall are three TREADMILLS, along with a POSTER on the wall above them.</s> <s>The back wall is entirely covered with a MIRROR, in front of which is a WEIGHT RACK.</s> <s>Sticking out from the wall to the right of the door you just came from is a BENCH PRESS.</s> <s>On the slanted right wall are some CHAIRS.</s> <s>All the way in the back-right corner of the room is a DISPLAY CASE, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR near the ceiling.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into the ballroom.</s> <s>The room is incredibly spacious, with plenty of room for dancing.</s> <s>The white walls are adorned with an intricate, regal pattern in gold.</s> <s>Several BENCHES and red velvet curtains line the walls of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a large STEREO SET<if cond="findItem('CARDBOARD BOX', 'ballroom', 'Object: FLOOR') !== undefined"> and a BOX on the FLOOR next to it</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and hung on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the break room from DOOR 1.</s> <s>Taking up the majority of the room in front of you are three LUNCH TABLES.</s> <s>In the corner to your right is a COUNTER, above which are some CUPBOARDS.</s> <s>Where the counter ends on the wall to your right is a REFRIGERATOR.</s> <s>In the middle of the right wall is DOOR 2, which is labeled "General Manager's Office", just next to which is a PANEL on the wall.</s> <s>In the corner to your right are two VENDING MACHINES, next to which is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>In the middle of the left wall is a small TABLE with two chairs on either side of it.</s> <s>In the back left corner of the room is a POOL TABLE just a few feet away from the walls.</s> <s>On the wall above it is a CAMERA and MONITOR near the ceiling.</s> <s>In the back right corner of the room is a COUCH.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the break room from DOOR 2, which locks behind you.</s> <s>Just next to the door you came from is a PANEL.</s> <s>Taking up the majority of the room in front of you are three LUNCH TABLES.</s> <s>Immediately to your left is a REFRIGERATOR.</s> <s>Next to it is a COUNTER in the corner, above which are some CUPBOARDS.</s> <s>In the middle of the left wall is DOOR 1.</s> <s>In the corner to your right is a COUCH.</s> <s>In the back right corner is a POOL TABLE just a few feet away from the walls.</s> <s>On the wall above it is a CAMERA and MONITOR near the ceiling.</s> <s>In the middle of the back wall is a small TABLE with two chairs on either side of it.</s> <s>In the back left corner are two VENDING MACHINES, next to which is a TRASH CAN.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter through the DOOR and find yourself in a strangely-shaped room.</s> <s>The first thing you notice is a familiar PODIUM in the center of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a DESK, next to which is a FILING CABINET.</s> <s>There is a message on the wall behind the desk hastily written in red paint: "SEE THE WORDS TOLD TRULY".</s> <s>On the right wall is a COUCH, and hung on the diagonal wall just past it is a large, framed PHOTO.</s> <s>To your left is an ELEVATOR jutting out of the corner.</s> <s>Next to it is a large BOOKSHELF against the wall.</s> <s>There is also a TRASH CAN in the back left corner.</s> <if cond="player.intelligence > 5"><s>You also notice an unusual trap door on the ceiling just to the left of the door you came through, though there doesn't seem to be any way to open it from this room.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step out of the ELEVATOR and find yourself in a strangely-shaped room.</s> <s>The first thing you notice is a familiar PODIUM in the center of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a COUCH, and hung on the diagonal wall just to the left of it is a large, framed PHOTO.</s> <s>To your left is a DESK, next to which is a FILING CABINET.</s> <s>There is a message on the wall behind the desk hastily written in red paint: "SEE THE WORDS TOLD TRULY".</s> <s>On the wall to your right is a DOOR.</s> <s>To the left of the elevator, the wall recedes back a bit, where you find a BOOKSHELF and a TRASH CAN.</s> <if cond="player.intelligence > 5"><s>You also notice an unusual trap door on the ceiling just to the left of the door you came through, though there doesn't seem to be any way to open it from this room.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You slide down and drop down from the CEILING, landing on your bottom.</s> <s>The trap door above you immediately shuts.</s> <s>You land next to a familiar PODIUM in the center of the room.</s> <s>Directly in front of you is a DESK, next to which is a FILING CABINET.</s> <s>There is a message on the wall behind the desk hastily written in red paint: "SEE THE WORDS TOLD TRULY".</s> <s>To your left is a BOOKSHELF and TRASH CAN next to an ELEVATOR.</s> <s>To your right is a COUCH, and hung on the diagonal wall just to the left of it is a large, framed PHOTO.</s> <s>Behind you is a DOOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 1, you enter the dining hall.</s> <s>The first thing that grabs your attention is a LONG TABLE stretching from side to side in the center of the room.</s> <s>Above it is a beautiful CHANDELIER.</s> <s>Scattered throughout the room are a number of smaller TABLES.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a small stage, on top of which sits a PIANO.</s> <s>Built into the left wall is a large CABINET.</s> <s>On the right wall is DOOR 2 with a TRASH CAN to the right of it, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR near the ceiling.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 2, you enter the dining hall.</s> <s>The first thing that grabs your attention is a LONG TABLE stretching straight ahead of you in the center of the room.</s> <s>Above it is a beautiful CHANDELIER.</s> <s>Scattered throughout the room are a number of smaller TABLES.</s> <s>On the right side of the room is a small stage, on top of which sits a PIANO.</s> <s>Built into the back wall is a large CABINET.</s> <s>On the left wall is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Near the ceiling above the door you just came from are a CAMERA and MONITOR, and just to the left of the door is a TRASH CAN.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 1, you enter the storage room.</s> <s>On your left and right are several TRASH CANS.</s> <s>Much of the room is taken up by rows of SHELVES.</s> <s>The edges of the room to your left are lined with RACKS.</s> <s>On the right side of the room is a collection of FURNITURE.</s> <s>Near the ceiling above the furniture are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>On the other side of the room is DOOR 2, attached to which is a LOCK.</s></desc>

<desc><s>Coming from DOOR 2, attached to which is a LOCK, you return to the storage room.</s> <s>Much of the room is taken up by rows of SHELVES.</s> <s>The edges of the room to your right are lined with RACKS.</s> <s>On the left side of the room is a collection of FURNITURE.</s> <s>Near the ceiling above the furniture are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>On the other side of the room is DOOR 1, to the left and right of which are several TRASH CANS.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR.</s> <s>The floor beneath your feet is made entirely of glass, giving you a look into a room below.</s> <s>There's a giant, purple orb with eight long, thick cords protruding out of it in different directions.</s> <s>You're unable to see where they're going.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a large POWER SWITCH.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the locker room through the CURTAIN.</s> <s>The room is fairly sparse.</s> <s>Just to your left is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>Just to your right is a TOWEL RETURN.</s> <s>On the left wall are LOCKERS, with a CUBBY mounted on the wall next to them.</s> <s>BENCHES are lined up in rows in the middle of the room.</s> <s>On the right side of the room are STALLS, SHOWERS, and a row of SINKS with a long MIRROR above them.</s> <s>At the other end of the room is the DOOR to the hot springs, with a MONITOR mounted on the wall above it.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR to the hot springs.</s> <s>The room is fairly sparse.</s> <s>On the right wall are LOCKERS, with a CUBBY mounted on the wall next to them.</s> <s>BENCHES are lined up in rows in the middle of the room.</s> <s>On the left side of the room are STALLS, SHOWERS, and a row of SINKS with a long MIRROR above them.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s> <s>At the other end of the room is the CURTAIN back into the hall.</s> <s>To the right of it is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>To the left of it is a TOWEL RETURN.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step out of the LOCKER ROOM.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above, before melting into rain drops in the steam.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>The normally chilly nighttime air is incredibly warm and steamy.</s></if></if> <s>You find yourself at a hot spring completely boxed in by tall rocks.</s> <s>Hot steam rises out of the SPRING, making the air around you quite warm.</s> <s>There is a MONITOR mounted above the door you just came from.</s> <s>In the back right corner is a large, pointy ROCK<if cond="findEvent('MOVE ROCK UPSTAIRS').ongoing === true"> next to a LADDER underground</if>.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>There are several monkeys, all of different species, bathing in the hot spring.</s> <s>One of them invites you to come join them.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You climb up the LADDER.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above, before melting into rain drops in the steam.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>The normally chilly nighttime air is incredibly warm and steamy.</s></if></if> <s>You find yourself at a hot spring completely boxed in by tall rocks.</s> <s>Hot steam rises out of the SPRING, making the air around you quite warm.</s> <s>There is a large, pointy ROCK right next to you.</s> <s>On the other side of the spring is the door to the LOCKER ROOM, with a MONITOR mounted above it.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>There are several monkeys, all of different species, bathing in the hot spring.</s> <s>One of them invites you to come join them.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into an overwhelmingly pink room.</s> <s>Towards the center back wall is a large BED, with a LEFT NIGHTSTAND and a RIGHT NIGHTSTAND on either side of it.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>Two monkeys are having intercourse in the bed.</s> <s>*Whoa!*</s> <s>Give them some privacy, will ya?</s></if> <s>To your left is a CLOSET, and right next to it is a DRESSER along the left wall.</s> <s>To your right is what appears to be a HOT TUB in the corner.</s> <s>In front of the bed is a LOVE SEAT, and in front of that is a COFFEE TABLE.</s> <s>The carpet under your feet is plush and hot pink, while the walls are all a soft, soothing, pastel pink.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s> <if cond="findEvent('CARELESS WHISPER').ongoing === true">"Careless Whisper" by George Michael is currently playing from the STEREO.</s> <s>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=izGwDsrQ1eQ</s></if></desc>
<desc><s>You enter the stairwell from FLOOR 1.</s> <s>The stairs on the right lead upwards, wrapping around to FLOOR 2.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You enter the stairwell from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>The stairs on the left lead downwards, wrapping around to FLOOR 1.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You enter the stairwell from FLOOR 1.</s> <s>The stairs on the right lead upwards, wrapping around to FLOOR 2.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You enter the stairwell from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>The stairs on the left lead downwards, wrapping around to FLOOR 1.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step into the elevator from FLOOR 1.</s> <s>It's large enough for all of you to fit in comfortably.</s> <s>The walls are made of a metal grate, allowing you to see the concrete walls of the elevator shaft surrounding you.</s> <s>The panel next to the door has only two buttons: a FLOOR 1 BUTTON and a FLOOR 2 BUTTON.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step into the elevator from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>It's large enough for all of you to fit in comfortably.</s> <s>The walls are made of a metal grate, allowing you to see the concrete walls of the elevator shaft surrounding you.</s> <s>The panel next to the door has only two buttons: a FLOOR 1 BUTTON and a FLOOR 2 BUTTON.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step into the elevator from FLOOR B.</s> <s>It's large enough for all of you to fit in comfortably.</s> <s>The walls are made of a metal grate, allowing you to see the concrete walls of the elevator shaft surrounding you.</s> <s>The panel next to the door has only two buttons: a FLOOR 1 BUTTON and a FLOOR 2 BUTTON.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You step out of the ELEVATOR into a short hallway.</s> <s>The walls are covered with red, velvet curtains.</s> <s>At the end of the hall are a large pair of wooden DOUBLE DOORS.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You step through the DOUBLE DOORS back into the short hallway you entered from.</s> <s>At the other end of the hall is an ELEVATOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOUBLE DOORS into a large, circular room with an incredibly high ceiling.</s> <s>The walls are blue with an ornate wallpaper design.</s> <s>In the center of the room is a ring of PODIUMS.</s> <s>Six red carpets branch out from the central ring into a large, red curtain on the wall.</s> <s>Behind the podiums is a tall, grand throne for Monokuma to sit in.</s> <s>You approach your assigned podium, as does everyone else.</s> <s>You eye your fellow classmates down.</s> <s>One of you is the culprit.</s> <s>With distrust in your hearts, this life-threatening Class Trial, billowing with hope and despair, begins.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the curtain obscuring the entrance to the WINNERS HALL into a large, circular room with an incredibly high ceiling.</s> <s>The walls are blue with an ornate wallpaper design.</s> <s>In the center of the room is a ring of PODIUMS.</s> <s>Six red carpets branch out from the central ring into a large, red curtain on the wall.</s> <s>In front of the podiums is a tall, grand throne for Monokuma to sit in.</s> <s>On the other side of the room are the DOUBLE DOORS.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step into the elevator from FLOOR B.</s> <s>It's large enough for only a few people to fit in comfortably.</s> <s>The walls are made of a metal grate, allowing you to see the concrete walls of the elevator shaft surrounding you.</s> <s>The panel next to the door has only two buttons: a FLOOR B BUTTON and a FLOOR 1 BUTTON.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You bend right from HALL 2 into hall 1.</s> <s>On the right wall are four more suites: SUITES 1 - 4, each with a numbered PANEL on the wall beside its door.</s> <s>In the middle of the left wall is an ELEVATOR, and on either side of it are several more WINDOWS which are covered by big, metal plates.</s> <s>The other end of the hallway bends into HALL 4.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the hallway is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 11.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you slants to the left and upwards, but is otherwise a straight-line path.</s> <s>It's only a slight slope upwards, but once you reach the top, it slants back down at about the same angle.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 3.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 4.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you slants to the left, then straightens out for a meter or two, then makes a sharp turn right.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 6.</s><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 6.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you makes a sharp turn left for a meter or two, then slants further left.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 4.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 5.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The vent ahead of you slants to the right, but is otherwise a straight-line path.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 13.</s><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 13.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s>  <s>The vent ahead of you slants to the right, but is otherwise a straight-line path.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 5.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 7.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you stretches straight ahead for quite a while, then slants right.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 12.</s><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 12.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead slants left for a few meters, then makes a sharp turn left, where it stretches forward for quite a while.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 7.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 8.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you slants left and downwards, but is otherwise a straight-line path for a while until it makes a sharp turn left.</s> <s>After a few meters, it makes a sharp turn right, and slopes upward at a steep angle.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 16.</s><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 16.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>Immediately when you enter, you start sliding down a steep slope.</s> <s>When you reach the bottom, the ventilation shaft makes a sharp turn left for a few meters.</s> <s>Then it slants right and upwards for quite a while.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 8.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 10.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you slopes downwards, but is otherwise a straight-line path for a few meters.</s> <s>Once you reach the bottom, it slants right for a little while, then makes a sharp right and upwards.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 14.</s><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You squeeze into the vent from SUITE 14.</s> <s>It's a bit of a tight fit, but you have enough mobility to crawl through.</s> <s>The shaft ahead of you slopes downwards, but is otherwise a straight-line path for a few meters.</s> <s>Once you reach the bottom, it slants left for a little while, then makes a sharp left and upwards.</s> <s>At the other end of the shaft is a grate to SUITE 10.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = true" /></desc>

<desc><s>The barren wasteland around you suddenly flashes in and out before fading away entirely, and you suddenly find yourself in the courtyard in a winter wonderland.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>The ground as far as you can see is caked thick with snow.</s> <s>The only exception is a clear, straight path between the GATE and ROZZEM HOTEL.</s> <s>In the middle of said path, however, is a circle containing a hideous STATUE, which has a MONITOR mounted on its base.</s> <s>Attached to the wall above the hotel doors is a CAMERA.</s> <s>The courtyard is enclosed by two hallways of the hotel reaching out diagonally.</s> <s>To your right is a square area, surrounded in tall rocks, from which steam is rising out of.</s> <s>There's also a small SHED near it.</s> <s>To your left is a frozen-over POND.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the ROZZEM HOTEL into a winter wonderland.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>The ground as far as you can see is caked thick with snow.</s> <s>The only exception is a clear, straight path between the hotel to the GATE.</s> <s>In the middle of said path, however, is a circle containing a hideous STATUE, which has a MONITOR mounted on its base.</s> <s>Attached to the wall above the hotel doors is a CAMERA.</s> <s>The courtyard is enclosed by two hallways of the hotel reaching out diagonally.</s> <s>To your right is a square area, surrounded in tall rocks, from which steam is rising out of.</s> <s>There's also a small SHED near it.</s> <s>To your left is a frozen-over POND.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You also see a giant friendly MUSHROOM in the distance?</s> <s>Friendly mushroom...</s> <s>Mushy giant friend!</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You pass through the GATE into the courtyard.</s> <s>Aside from a clear, straight path to the ROZZEM HOTEL, the ground is caked thick with snow.</s> <s>In the middle of said path, however, is a circle containing a hideous STATUE, which has a MONITOR mounted on its base.</s> <s>Attached to the wall above the hotel doors is a CAMERA.</s> <s>The courtyard is enclosed by two hallways of the hotel reaching out diagonally.</s> <s>To your left is a square area, surrounded in tall rocks, from which steam is rising out of.</s> <s>There's also a small SHED near it.</s> <s>To your right is a frozen-over POND.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a giant friendly MUSHROOM in the distance?</s></if></desc>

You pass through the gate onto a short, straight path. A single evergreen tree stands to your right, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk. Just ahead is the SOUTH PATH. There's some sort of a... weasel walking towards you? It gets bigger and bigger as it approaches... or maybe you're just getting smaller. Either way, it thunders on past you, and you think you see... is that... one of your classmates clinging to its leg!?

No, wait. Just another hallucination.

You step onto path 1 from the SOUTH PATH. A single evergreen tree stands to your left, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk. Just ahead is the GATE to the hotel courtyard. There's some sort of a... weasel walking towards you? It gets bigger and bigger as it approaches... or maybe you're just getting smaller. Either way, it thunders on past you, and you think you see... is that... one of your classmates clinging to its leg!?

No, wait. Just another hallucination.

<desc><s>You step onto path 2 from the SOUTH PATH.</s> <s>It's a short, thin path leading to a CHECKPOINT building for a military base, which is enclosed by a barbed wire fence.</s> <s>The sign on the door says "  "<if cond="player.hasAttribute('knows russian')">, which you know means "trespassers will be shot"</if>.</s> <s>Mounted on the checkpoint wall above the door are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the CHECKPOINT.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You find that you're suddenly in the middle of the OCEAN!?</s> <s>Wait... nevermind.</s> </if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>On the wall above the door you just came from are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>The path ahead of you is short and thin, leading to the SOUTH PATH.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto path 3 from the EAST PATH.</s> <s>A tall mountain looms over you, and atop it is a tall radio tower.</s> <s>A single evergreen tree stands to your left, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>The path ahead of you splits into three.</s> <s>Straight ahead is the entrance to a GIFT SHOP.</s> <s>To the left is an entrance into MOUNT CHIRIP.</s> <s>To the right is the MOUNTAIN BASE.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the GIFT SHOP.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You find that you're suddenly in the middle of the OCEAN!?</s> <s>Wait... nevermind.</s> </if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>The path splits in three directions, one of which you just came from.</s> <s>Behind you to your right is the entrance into MOUNT CHIRIP.</s> <s>Behind you to your left is the MOUNTAIN BASE.</s> <s>All three paths converge in front of you, leading to the EAST PATH.</s> <s>Just to the right of it stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit MOUNT CHIRIP.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You find that you're suddenly in the middle of the OCEAN!?</s> <s>Wait... nevermind.</s> </if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>The path splits in three directions, one of which you just came from.</s> <s>The middle path leads to the GIFT SHOP.</s> <s>The path to the left leads to the MOUNTAIN BASE.</s> <s>All three paths converge in front of you, leading to the EAST PATH.</s> <s>Just to the right of it stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto path 3 from the MOUNTAIN BASE.</s> <s>The path splits in three directions, one of which you just came from.</s> <s>The middle path leads to the GIFT SHOP.</s> <s>The path to the right leads to the entrance into MOUNT CHIRIP.</s> <s>All three paths converge in front of you, leading to the EAST PATH.</s> <s>Just to the right of it stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto path 4 from the WEST PATH.</s> <s>It's a short path that curves left and right to the CIRCUS TENT.</s> <s>To your right stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You finally exit the CIRCUS TENT.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>It's so wonderful to be outside again.</s> <s>The short path ahead of you curves left and then right again, leading to the WEST PATH.</s> <s>To your left stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto path 5 from the NORTH PATH.</s> <s>It's a short path that thins out as it leads to a BRIDGE connecting to a tall tower.</s> <s>Behind you stands a single evergreen tree, mounted on the trunk of which are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step off the BRIDGE onto path 5.</s> <s>It's a short path that widens into the NORTH PATH.</s> <s>At the end of it stands a single evergreen tree, mounted on the trunk of which are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You step onto the bridge from PATH 5.</s> <s>In the middle of the bridge is a hexagonal GAZEBO.</s> <s>A creepy stone TOWER looms over you at the other side.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the TOWER.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>In the middle of the bridge is a hexagonal GAZEBO.</s> <s>The other end of the bridge leads to PATH 5.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a giant friendly MUSHROOM in the distance?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto the north path from PATH 5.</s> <s>The path forks left and right.</s> <s>To the left, it leads to the EAST PATH, with Mount Chirip looming over you.</s> <s>To the right, it leads to the WEST PATH.</s> <s>Directly across from the fork stands a single evergreen tree, mounted on the trunk of which are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You continue down the EAST PATH, arriving at the north path.</s> <s>A huge, circular lake comes into view, in the center of which is a tower.</s> <s>The path ahead forks right onto PATH 5.</s> <s>Across from the fork stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>The path curves left onto the WEST PATH.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You continue down the WEST PATH, arriving at the north path.</s> <s>A huge, circular lake comes into view, in the center of which is a tower.</s> <s>The path ahead forks left onto PATH 5.</s> <s>Across from the fork stands a single evergreen tree, and mounted on its trunk are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>To the north is Mount Chirip.</s> <s>The path curves right onto the EAST PATH.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto the east path from PATH 3.</s> <s>Just to your right<if cond="game.var = findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === true || findEvent('CHAPTER 4').ongoing === true; game.var === true"> is an extremely tall wall preventing you from following the path north</if><if cond="game.var === false">, the path leads into the NORTH PATH</if>.</s> <s>To your left is an incredibly long, curved path with not much to look at aside from a snow-filled wasteland to the left, along with tall mountains in the distance.</s> <s>There are several evergreen trees to the right, and mounted on the trunk on one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>Further along, the path bends right to the SOUTH PATH.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You continue down the NORTH PATH, arriving at the east path.</s> <s>The path almost immediately forks left onto PATH 3.</s> <s>Beyond that is an incredibly long, curved path with not much to look at aside from a snow-filled wasteland to the left, along with tall mountains in the distance.</s> <s>There are several evergreen trees to the right, and mounted on the trunk on one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>Further along, the path bends right to the SOUTH PATH.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You bend left from the SOUTH PATH onto the east path.</s> <s>This is an incredibly long, curved path with not much to look at aside from a snow-filled wasteland to your right, along with the tall mountains in the distance.</s> <s>There are several evergreen trees to your left, and mounted on the trunk of one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>Further along, the path forks right into PATH 3 <if cond="game.var = findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === true || findEvent('CHAPTER 4').ongoing === true; game.var === true">before running into an extremely tall wall preventing you from following the path north</if><if cond="game.var === false">before leading to the NORTH PATH</if>.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You do a double-take as a white blur passes through your peripheral vision.</s> <s>You can just barely make out the form of a tall, powerful hominid covered in white fur standing stark against the snow.</s> <s>Just as quickly as you make it out, the figure vanishes, blending in with the white scenery.</s> <s>Or maybe it was just your imagination...?</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto the south path from PATH 1.</s> <s>A single evergreen tree stands in front of you, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south<if cond="game.var = findEvent('CHAPTER 2').ongoing === true; game.var === true || findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === true">, as well as an extremely tall wall preventing you from following the path to the west</if>.</s> <s>To your left, the path forks off into the thinner PATH 2, before wrapping around the fence, <if cond="game.var === true">where another tall wall prevents you from following the path to the east</if><if cond="game.var === false">leading to the EAST PATH</if>.</s> <if cond="game.var === false && findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === false"><s>To your right, the path continues, eventually leading to the WEST PATH.</s></if> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a person you dont recognize.</s> <s>You hear them shout DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME!</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step onto the south path from PATH 2.</s> <s>A single evergreen tree stands to your left, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south.</s> <s>To your right, the path wraps around the fence, <if cond="game.var = findEvent('CHAPTER 2').ongoing === true; game.var === true">where an extremely tall wall prevents you from following the path to the east</if><if cond="game.var === false">leading to the EAST PATH</if>.</s> <s>To your left, the path continues, branching off into PATH 1<if cond="game.var = game.var === true || findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === true; game.var === true">, before eventually leading to another extremely tall wall preventing you from following the path to the west</if><if cond="game.var === false">, and then eventually leads to the WEST PATH</if>.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a person you dont recognize.</s> <s>You hear them shout DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME!</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You continue down the EAST PATH, arriving at the south path.</s> <s>The path ahead wraps around the fence of the military base, then branches off to the thinner PATH 2.</s> <s>Just past that, it forks off again to PATH 1, to the left of which stands a single evergreen tree, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk.</s> <s>Beyond that, the path continues<if cond="game.var = findEvent('CHAPTER 3').ongoing === true; game.var === true">, before eventually running into an extremely tall wall that blocks you from following the path to the west</if><if cond="game.var === false">, before eventually leading to the WEST PATH</if>.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a person you dont recognize.</s> <s>You hear them shout DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME!</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You continue down the WEST PATH, arriving at the south path.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south.</s> <s>The path ahead curves before forking left to PATH 1.</s> <s>Just to the right of that stands a single evergreen tree, with a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on its trunk.</s> <s>Beyond that, the path forks again, this time right onto the thinner PATH 2.</s> <s>It then wraps around the fence of the military base, leading to the EAST PATH.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You see a person you dont recognize.</s> <s>You hear them shout DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS DOWN WITH CIS MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME MONKI TIME!</s></if></desc>

You step onto the west path from PATH 4. Several evergreen trees stand in front of you, and mounted on the trunk on one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR. Just to your right, the path leads to the SOUTH PATH. To your left, an extremely tall wall prevents you from going norththe path leads to the NORTH PATH. All you to see to the west of the circus tent is a snow-covered wasteland too deep to traverse safely. There's some sort of a... weasel walking towards you? It gets bigger and bigger as it approaches... or maybe you're just getting smaller. Either way, it thunders on past you, and you think you see... is that... one of your classmates clinging to its leg!?

No, wait. Just another hallucination.

You continue down the NORTH PATH, arriving at the west path. All you see to the west is a snow-covered wasteland too deep to traverse safely. There are several evergreen trees to your left, and mounted on the trunk on one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR. Further down, the path forks right onto PATH 4, leading to a large circus tent. Past that, it leads to the SOUTH PATH. There's some sort of a... weasel walking towards you? It gets bigger and bigger as it approaches... or maybe you're just getting smaller. Either way, it thunders on past you, and you think you see... is that... one of your classmates clinging to its leg!?

No, wait. Just another hallucination.

You continue down the SOUTH PATH, arriving at the west path. The path quickly forks left onto PATH 4, leading to a large circus tent. There are several evergreen trees to your right, and mounted on the trunk on one of them are a CAMERA and MONITOR. Further down the path, an extremely tall wall prevents you from going northit leads to the NORTH PATH. All you to see to the west of the circus tent is a snow-covered wasteland too deep to traverse safely. There's some sort of a... weasel walking towards you? It gets bigger and bigger as it approaches... or maybe you're just getting smaller. Either way, it thunders on past you, and you think you see... is that... one of your classmates clinging to its leg!?

No, wait. Just another hallucination.

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 1 into a fairly large, empty building.</s> <s>The only fixtures in this room are two long DESKS stretching from wall to wall in the middle of the room.</s> <s>Scuff marks on the floor between the desks suggest there was once a turnstile or something of that nature there, but now the path to DOOR 2 at the other end of the building is clear.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 2 into a fairly large, empty building.</s> <s>The only fixtures in this room are two long DESKS stretching from wall to wall in the middle of the room.</s> <s>Scuff marks on the floor between the desks suggest there was once a turnstile or something of that nature there, but now the path to DOOR 1 at the other end of the building is clear.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the CHECKPOINT and find yourself on a military base.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>A tall, barbed wire fence surrounds the base.</s> <s>In the middle of the square is a gold STATUE, which has a MONITOR mounted on its base.</s> <s>Directly in front of you is the WAREHOUSE SIDE ENTRANCE, with the WAREHOUSE FRONT ENTRANCE around the corner in the middle of the building.</s> <s>Past that is an AIRCRAFT HANGAR, whose entrance lies between the warehouse and the THEATER.</s> <s>On the other side of the base to your left is a small JAIL.</s> <s>Behind that is a TANK HANGAR.</s> <s>Sandwiched between the tank hangar and the theater is the MESS HALL.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the mess hall's door is a CAMERA.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south and east.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You look up and see VULTURES circling you overhead.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the JAIL back onto the military base.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>In the middle of the square is a gold STATUE, which has a MONITOR mounted on its base.</s> <s>The building you just came from is sandwiched between the TANK HANGAR on your left and the CHECKPOINT on your right.</s> <s>To the left beyond the tank hangar is the MESS HALL, which has a CAMERA mounted above its door.</s> <s>Past even that is the THEATER.</s> <s>Across from the checkpoint is a warehouse, with the WAREHOUSE SIDE ENTRANCE facing the checkpoint, and the WAREHOUSE FRONT ENTRANCE facing the theater.</s> <s>All the way on the other side of the base is an AIRCRAFT HANGAR.</s> <s>You can see steep mountains in the distance to the south and east.</s> <if cond="let prob = 500; if (player.statusString.includes('exhausted')) prob /= 50; if (player.statusString.includes('delirious')) prob /= 500; const x = Math.floor(Math.random() * prob); x === 0"><s>You look up and see VULTURES circling you overhead.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a small jail.</s> <s>To your right is a DESK.</s> <s>In front of you are three jail cells: CELL 1, CELL 2, and CELL 3, from left to right.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s> <if cond="findRoom('cell-1').channel = this.channel; findRoom('cell-2').channel = this.channel; findRoom('cell-3').channel = this.channel; false"><s>You will never see this.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You exit CELL 1.</s> <s>To your left are CELL 2 and CELL 3, as well as a DESK in the corner of the room.</s> <s>Across from you is the DOOR out of here.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s> <if cond="findRoom('cell-1').channel = this.channel; findRoom('cell-2').channel = this.channel; findRoom('cell-3').channel = this.channel; false"><s>You will never see this.</s></if></desc>
