<desc><s>You step into cell 1 from the DOOR.</s> <s>It's a rather small room.</s> <s>On your left is a BED and a small table.</s> <s>On your right is a SINK.</s> <s>In the righthand corner is a small divider, behind which is a TOILET.</s> <s>The BARS behind you give you a good look into the main room, and the left side of them make up the door you just came from.</s> <if cond="this.channel = findRoom('jail').channel; false"><s>You will never see this.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step into cell 2 from the DOOR.</s> <s>It's a rather small room.</s> <s>On your left is a BED and a small table.</s> <s>On your right is a SINK.</s> <s>In the righthand corner is a small divider, behind which is a TOILET.</s> <s>The BARS behind you give you a good look into the main room, and the left side of them make up the door you just came from.</s> <if cond="this.channel = findRoom('jail').channel; false"><s>You will never see this.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You step into cell 3 from the DOOR.</s> <s>It's a rather small room.</s> <s>On your left is a BED and a small table.</s> <s>On your right is a SINK.</s> <s>In the righthand corner is a small divider, behind which is a TOILET.</s> <s>The BARS behind you give you a good look into the main room, and the left side of them make up the door you just came from.</s> <if cond="this.channel = findRoom('jail').channel; false"><s>You will never see this.</s></if></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the tank hangar from the HANGAR DOOR.</s> <s>The hangar is a large, spacious area with brick walls and a gable roof with glass on the sides, so you can see outside.</s> <if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true || findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true"><s>The lighting is somewhat dim.</s></if> <s>To the right, you see TANK 1, and directly in front of you is TANK 2.</s> <s>On the left wall, you see a POSTER<if cond="findPuzzle('ENTER', 'tank-hangar').solved === true">, as well as an unfurled scroll hung from the wall containing a single letter in red paint: a</if>.</s> <s>On the right, there is a SCREEN above a KEYPAD.</s> <s>Hung from the ceiling is a CAMERA and on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge from the HATCH and step out of TANK 1.</s> <if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true || findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true"><s>The room is just as dark and dreary as you remember it.</s></if> <s>To your right sits the decrepit old TANK 2.</s> <s>Behind you is a POSTER on the wall<if cond="findPuzzle('ENTER', 'tank-hangar').solved === true">, as well as an unfurled scroll hung from the wall containing a single letter in red paint: a</if>.</s> <s>Across from that on the opposite end is a SCREEN above a KEYPAD.</s> <s>All the way to the right on the wall in front of you is the HANGAR DOOR.</s> <s>On the wall above it is a MONITOR and hung from the ceiling is a CAMERA.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You climb into the rusty old tank from the HATCH.</s> <s>Inside is a small, enclosed space that can only accommodate a maximum of two people comfortably at most.</s> <s>There are two seats in front of the CONTROLS, and a cylindrical CHAMBER in the back.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the mess hall from DOOR 1.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by LUNCH TABLES.</s> <s>Most of the right wall is taken up by a COUNTER with a WINDOW.</s> <s>Further back along the wall is DOOR 2.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the back wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the mess hall from DOOR 2.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by LUNCH TABLES.</s> <s>Most of the wall behind you is taken up by a COUNTER with a WINDOW.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is DOOR 1.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the right wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the mess hall through the WINDOW.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by LUNCH TABLES.</s> <s>Most of the wall behind you is taken up by a COUNTER, with DOOR 2 to your right.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is DOOR 1.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the right wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a fairly empty kitchen.</s> <s>The door behind you is equipped with a BOLT.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a PREP TABLE.</s> <s>Behind it is an OVEN and a large MIXER.</s> <s>Against the left wall is a REFRIGERATOR and a SINK.</s> <s>On the right wall is a large PANTRY.</s> <s>On the wall behind you is a WINDOW, next to which is a CRANK.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the left wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You hop through the WINDOW into a fairly empty kitchen.</s> <s>Next to the window you just came from is a CRANK.</s> <s>The door behind you is equipped with a BOLT.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a PREP TABLE.</s> <s>Behind it is an OVEN and a large MIXER.</s> <s>Against the left wall is a REFRIGERATOR and a SINK.</s> <s>On the right wall is a large PANTRY.</s> <s>Behind you to the left is a DOOR, which is equipped with a BOLT.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the left wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOUBLE DOORS into a rather small theater.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by CHAIRS.</s> <s>You're flanked by two small rooms: CONTROL ROOM 1, with WINDOW 1 looking into it, on your left and CONTROL ROOM 2, with WINDOW 2 looking into it, on your right.</s> <s>There are two large STAGE LIGHTS hung from the ceiling on both sides of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a STAGE with a large BACKGROUND behind it.</s> <s>On either side of the stage are exits into the backstage area: STAGE LEFT and STAGE RIGHT.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the doors you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge from CONTROL ROOM 1.</s> <s>On the left side of the room you just came from is WINDOW 1 looking into it.</s> <s>Directly across from you is CONTROL ROOM 2, with WINDOW 2 looking into it on its left side as well.</s> <s>In the middle of the two rooms on the wall to your right are the DOUBLE DOORS leading outside the theater.</s> <s>A MONITOR is hung on the wall above them.</s> <s>The majority of the theater is taken up by CHAIRS.</s> <s>There are two large STAGE LIGHTS hung from the ceiling on both sides of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a STAGE with a large BACKGROUND behind it.</s> <s>On either side of the stage are exits into the backstage area: STAGE LEFT and STAGE RIGHT.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge from CONTROL ROOM 2.</s> <s>On the right side of the room you just came from is WINDOW 2 looking into it.</s> <s>Directly across from you is CONTROL ROOM 1, with WINDOW 2 looking into it on its right side as well.</s> <s>In the middle of the two rooms on the wall to your left are the DOUBLE DOORS leading outside the theater.</s> <s>A MONITOR is hung on the wall above them.</s> <s>The majority of the theater is taken up by CHAIRS.</s> <s>There are two large STAGE LIGHTS hung from the ceiling on both sides of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room is a STAGE with a large BACKGROUND behind it.</s> <s>On either side of the stage are exits into the backstage area: STAGE LEFT and STAGE RIGHT.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from STAGE RIGHT onto the STAGE, which has a large BACKGROUND behind it.</s> <s>Directly across from you is STAGE LEFT.</s> <s>The majority of the room off the stage is taken up by CHAIRS.</s> <s>There are two large STAGE LIGHTS hung from the ceiling on both sides of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room are CONTROL ROOM 1, with WINDOW 1 looking into it, on the right and CONTROL ROOM 2, with WINDOW 2 looking into it, on the left.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall between them are the DOUBLE DOORS leading outside the theater.</s> <s>A MONITOR is hung on the wall above them, and there is a CAMERA on the ceiling in the middle of the room.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from STAGE LEFT onto the STAGE, which has a large BACKGROUND behind it.</s> <s>Directly across from you is STAGE RIGHT.</s> <s>The majority of the room off the stage is taken up by CHAIRS.</s> <s>There are two large STAGE LIGHTS hung from the ceiling on both sides of the room.</s> <s>In the back of the room are CONTROL ROOM 1, with WINDOW 1 looking into it, on the right and CONTROL ROOM 2, with WINDOW 2 looking into it, on the left.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall between them are the DOUBLE DOORS leading outside the theater.</s> <s>A MONITOR is hung on the wall above them, and there is a CAMERA on the ceiling in the middle of the room.</s></desc>
<desc><s>How did you climb out of the TRAP DOOR?</s> <s>You're not supposed to be seeing this.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR into a tiny control room.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by a CONTROL PANEL, with a WINDOW on the wall looking out into the theater.</s> <s>Behind the control panel is a CHAIR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR into a tiny control room.</s> <s>The majority of the room is taken up by a CONTROL PANEL, with a WINDOW on the wall looking out into the theater.</s> <s>Behind the control panel is a CHAIR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You drop into the TRAP DOOR.</s> <s>The room around you is rather small and poorly lit.</s> <s>Much of the room is taken up by supports for the stage, as well, so there isn't a lot of space to move around.</s> <s>However, there is a rather large BOX in the corner.</s> <s>It seems the only way out of here is through a narrow hallway leading into a set of stairs that wraps around.</s> <s>The stairs end at a DOOR, attached to which is a BOLT.</s> <s>It seems even here you can't escape being monitored, as there is a CAMERA on the ceiling, as well as a MONITOR on the wall next to the hallway.</s><if cond="this.exit[0].unlocked = false; true" /></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into the stairs.</s> <s>Attached to the door behind you is a BOLT.</s> <s>It doesn't seem there are all that many stairs, as they wrap around fairly quickly, descending into a short hallway.</s> <s>At the end of the hallway is a small, poorly lit room.</s> <s>Much of the room is taken up by supports for the stage, as well, so there isn't a lot of space to move around.</s> <s>However, there is a rather large BOX in the corner.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a TRAP DOOR which is too high to reach.</s> <s>It seems even here you can't escape being monitored, as there is a CAMERA on the ceiling, as well as a MONITOR on the wall next to the hallway.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit STAGE RIGHT.</s> <s>The area behind the stage is an expanse of black walls, forming a hallway with two equally-sized rooms on either side of the stage.</s> <s>The lighting back here is very minimal, and the floor is designed to make as little sound when tread upon as possible.</s> <s>In front of you is a PROP TABLE<if cond="game.var = findItem('ACTING BLOCK', 'backstage', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined"> and <if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1"><var v="game.var.quantity" /></if><if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity === 1">a</if> BLOCK<if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1">S</if></if>.</s> <s>The hallway backstage is mostly empty, leaving room for the actors to move about.</s> <s>However, making your way to the other end, you pass by the door to the GREEN ROOM, the door to the STAIRS, and the door to the DRESSING ROOM.</s> <s>At the other end is another room leading to STAGE LEFT, this one including a CHAIR CART.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit STAGE LEFT.</s> <s>The area behind the stage is an expanse of black walls, forming a hallway with two equally-sized rooms on either side of the stage.</s> <s>The lighting back here is very minimal, and the floor is designed to make as little sound when tread upon as possible.</s> <s>In front of you is a CHAIR CART.</s> <s>The hallway backstage is mostly empty, leaving room for the actors to move about.</s> <s>However, making your way to the other end, you pass by the door to the DRESSING ROOM, the door to the STAIRS, and the door to the GREEN ROOM.</s> <s>At the other end is another room leading to STAGE RIGHT, this one including a PROP TABLE<if cond="game.var = findItem('ACTING BLOCK', 'backstage', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined"> and <if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1"><var v="game.var.quantity" /></if><if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity === 1">a</if> BLOCK<if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1">S</if></if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the DRESSING ROOM.</s> <s>The area behind the stage is an expanse of black walls, forming a hallway with two equally-sized rooms on either side of the stage.</s> <s>The lighting back here is very minimal, and the floor is designed to make as little sound when tread upon as possible.</s> <s>Just to your right is the exit into STAGE RIGHT, which has a PROP TABLE<if cond="game.var = findItem('ACTING BLOCK', 'backstage', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined"> and <if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1"><var v="game.var.quantity" /></if><if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity === 1">a</if> BLOCK<if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1">S</if></if> next to it.</s> <s>To your left are the doors to the STAIRS and the GREEN ROOM.</s> <s>Just ahead from there is the exit into STAGE LEFT, next to which is a CHAIR CART.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the GREEN ROOM.</s> <s>The area behind the stage is an expanse of black walls, forming a hallway with two equally-sized rooms on either side of the stage.</s> <s>The lighting back here is very minimal, and the floor is designed to make as little sound when tread upon as possible.</s> <s>Just to your left is the exit into STAGE LEFT, which has a CHAIR CART next to it.</s> <s>To your right are the doors to the STAIRS and the DRESSING ROOM.</s> <s>Just ahead from there is the exit into STAGE RIGHT, next to which is a PROP TABLE<if cond="game.var = findItem('ACTING BLOCK', 'backstage', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined"> and <if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1"><var v="game.var.quantity" /></if><if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity === 1">a</if> BLOCK<if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1">S</if></if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the STAIRS.</s> <s>The area behind the stage is an expanse of black walls, forming a hallway with two equally-sized rooms on either side of the stage.</s> <s>The lighting back here is very minimal, and the floor is designed to make as little sound when tread upon as possible.</s> <s>To your right is the door to the DRESSING ROOM.</s> <s>Just ahead of that is the exit into STAGE RIGHT, next to which is a PROP TABLE<if cond="game.var = findItem('ACTING BLOCK', 'backstage', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined"> and <if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1"><var v="game.var.quantity" /></if><if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity === 1">a</if> BLOCK<if cond="game.var !== undefined && game.var.quantity > 1">S</if></if>.</s> <s>To your left is the door to the GREEN ROOM.</s> <s>Just ahead of that is the exit into STAGE LEFT, next to which is a CHAIR CART.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You open the DOOR into the dressing room.</s> <s>It's a rectangular, plain beige room with plenty of space for the actors to change costume.</s> <s>Along the left and back walls is a long COUNTER, which as a MIRROR attached to the wall behind it.</s> <s>To your right is a medium-sized TRASH CAN.</s> <s>Towards the back right corner is a CLOTHING RACK with many hangers.</s> <s>On the wall above it is a SHELF for wigs.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You open the DOOR into the green room, noting that it indeed lives up to its name.</s> <s>The walls are a soft pastel green, and there is a green SOFA in the middle of the room, bordered on each side by a LEFT ARMCHAIR and a RIGHT ARMCHAIR.</s> <s>In front of the sofa is a COFFEE TABLE with a small TELEVISION sitting upon it.</s> <s>Towards the back right corner is a two-person LOVESEAT, which sits next to the COSTUME CLOSET.</s> <s>There is also a WATER COOLER nestled between these two locations.</s> <s>In the back left corner, there is a REFRIGERATOR and a MARBLE COUNTERTOP.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA, and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOUBLE DOORS into a spacious warehouse.</s> <s>The CEILING in this room is rather high, and a CAMERA is hung from it.</s> <s>Many SHELVES line the room, forming aisles in the space between them.</s> <s>There are also several CRATES <if cond="game.var = findItem('OIL DRUM', 'warehouse', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined">and an OIL DRUM </if>lined up against the wall near the doors you just came from.</s> <s>To your right is a door to the CONFERENCE ROOM.</s> <s>In the back right corner is the door to the OFFICE.</s> <s>The conference room and the office create a fairly wide hallway leading to the SIDE DOOR.</s> <s>Above the doors you just came from is a MONITOR on the wall.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the SIDE DOOR into a fairly wide hallway.</s> <s>The CEILING in this room is rather high, and a CAMERA is hung from it.</s> <s>Immediately to your right is the door to the OFFICE.</s> <s>The end of the hallway opens up into the warehouse proper.</s> <s>To the left is the door to the CONFERENCE ROOM.</s> <s>On the left wall is a pair of DOUBLE DOORS, above which is a MONITOR on the wall.</s> <s>Many SHELVES line the warehouse, forming aisles in the space between them.</s> <s>There are also several CRATES <if cond="game.var = findItem('OIL DRUM', 'warehouse', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined">and an OIL DRUM </if>lined up against the wall near the front entrance.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the CONFERENCE ROOM, returning to the spacious warehouse.</s> <s>The CEILING in this room is rather high, and a CAMERA is hung from it.</s> <s>Many SHELVES line the room, forming aisles in the space between them.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is a pair of DOUBLE DOORS, above which is a MONITOR on the wall.</s> <s>There are several CRATES <if cond="game.var = findItem('OIL DRUM', 'warehouse', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined">and an OIL DRUM </if>lined up against the wall near the front entrance.</s> <s>Behind you, the space between the conference room and the OFFICE creates a fairly wide hallway.</s> <s>At the end of the hallway is the SIDE DOOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You exit the OFFICE into a fairly wide hallway.</s> <s>The CEILING in this room is rather high, and a CAMERA is hung from it.</s> <s>Immediately to your left is the SIDE DOOR.</s> <s>The end of the hallway opens up into the warehouse proper.</s> <s>To the left is the door to the CONFERENCE ROOM.</s> <s>On the left wall is a pair of DOUBLE DOORS, above which is a MONITOR on the wall.</s> <s>There are several CRATES <if cond="game.var = findItem('OIL DRUM', 'warehouse', 'Object: FLOOR'); game.var !== undefined">and an OIL DRUM </if>lined up against the wall near the front entrance.</s> <s>Many SHELVES line the warehouse, forming aisles in the space between them.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a long conference room.</s> <s>The main fixture in this room is a long TABLE with rounded ends.</s> <s>There are 16 CHAIRS surrounding it.</s> <s>On the ceiling above the table are a PROJECTOR and a CAMERA.</s> <s>In the back left corner is a PODIUM.</s> <s>On the back wall are <if cond="findPuzzle('DOWN BUTTON', 'conference-room').solved === true">a PROJECTOR SCREEN, </if>two SPEAKERS<if cond="findPuzzle('DOWN BUTTON', 'conference-room').solved === true">,</if> and a PANEL.</s> <s>On the right wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the office from DOOR 1.</s> <s>It's a fairly small room.</s> <s>On the right side of the room is a DESK, in front of which are two CHAIRS.</s> <s>The wall behind it is made of a glass CABINET.</s> <s>The back wall is covered with a MAP.</s> <s>On the left is DOOR 2, above which a FLAG is hung.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a CAMERA and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge back into the office from DOOR 2.</s> <s>A FLAG hangs above it.</s> <s>The wall to your left is covered with a MAP.</s> <s>Towards the back of the room is a DESK, behind which is a wall made of a glass CABINET.</s> <s>In front of the desk are two CHAIRS.</s> <s>On the right wall is DOOR 1.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a CAMERA and just below it on the wall is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR, which is equipped with a LOCK.</s> <s>Though this room is slightly bigger than the office you just came from, there's much less space to walk around.</s> <s>There are FILING CABINETS against every wall in this room, as well in the middle of the room, creating only a narrow square to walk around in.</s> <s>One of them, the PINK FILING CABINET, sticks out like a sore thumb.</s> <s>There is a VENT near the ceiling on the back wall.</s> <s>Hung from the ceiling in the center of the room is a CAMERA and above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the large HANGAR DOOR.</s> <s>The concrete brick of a building does little to guard you from the biting cold of the outside air.</s> <s>The hangar is a large, spacious area with little in the way of decorations.</s> <s>Taking up much of the space in the hangar are two FIGHTER JETS lined up front to back.</s> <s>They're facing the large, open door to the RUNWAY.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step inside from the RUNWAY.</s> <s>The concrete brick of a building does little to guard you from the biting cold of the outside air.</s> <s>The hangar is a large, spacious area with little in the way of decorations.</s> <s>Taking up much of the space in the hangar are two FIGHTER JETS lined up front to back.</s> <s>To your right is the even larger HANGAR DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the hangar door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You walk out onto the runway, leaving the HANGAR.</s> <if cond="this.exit[1].dest.name === 'helicopter'"><s>A small HELICOPTER sits on the runway.</s> </if><s>The tarmac is exposed, away from the barbed wire fence surrounding the rest of the military base.</s> <s>It extends out nearly 50 meters.</s> <s>The ground immediately surrounding it is covered with snow that quickly becomes too deep to move through safely.</s> <s>Directly across from the runway you can make out a huge MOUNTAIN RANGE, with more mountains further in the distance to the east.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall of the hangar are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>
<desc><s>Why are you getting out of the helicopter?</s></desc>

<desc><s>You get in the helicopter.</s> <if cond="player.name === 'Adrian'"><s>You know exactly how to operate this thing.</s></if><if cond="player.name !== 'Adrian'"><s>You don't know how to operate this thing.</s></if> <s>There's no fuel in the tank.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the only DOOR into a small gift shop.</s> <s>CLOTHING RACKS line the store, forming aisles just wide enough to walk down.</s> <s>In the right corner is a check-out COUNTER.</s> <s>On the left wall is a POSTER.</s> <s>In the back of the room are FITTING ROOMS.</s> <s>On the ceiling is a CAMERA and on the wall behind the check-out counter is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You walk toward the base of the mountain from PATH 3.</s> <s>There is a SKI LIFT on the right that doesn't appear to be functional anymore.</s> <s>Attached to the bottom of it are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>From down here, you can see a radio tower high up the mountain.</s> <s>It doesn't look like it would be impossible to climb up there...</s> <s>(Note: To attempt to climb the mountain, DM the moderator.)</s></desc>

<desc><s>You descend from the mountain.</s> <s>To your left is a SKI LIFT that doesn't appear to be functional anymore.</s> <s>Attached to the bottom of it are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>The mountain base leads to PATH 3.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You start climbing the mountain.</s> <s>Your success will be determined by the moderator's rolls.</s></desc>
<desc><s>At last, you finally reach the summit.</s> <s>Atop the peak is a large RADIO TOWER, mounted on which are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s> <s>The SKI LIFT ends here and loops back down.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter the mountain from OUTSIDE, finding yourself in a cave.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>On the left wall is SIGN 1.</s> <s>On the right wall is SIGN 2.</s> <s>A CAMERA and MONITOR are mounted on the wall as well.</s> <s>The cave narrows into a TUNNEL straight ahead.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You continue straight from the TUNNEL and find yourself in a cave.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>On the right wall is SIGN 1.</s> <s>On the left wall is SIGN 2.</s> <s>A CAMERA and MONITOR are mounted on the wall as well.</s> <s>Directly across from you is the exit OUTSIDE.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You continue straight ahead from TUNNEL 1.</s> <s>The tunnel leads to a giant cave with a LAKE in the middle.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>At the other end of the cave is a SIGN, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on the wall.</s> <s>On the left side of the cave are several HOOKS.</s> <s>The tunnel behind you comes to a crossroads.</s> <s>Behind you to the left is TUNNEL 2.</s> <s>Behind you to the right is TUNNEL 3<if cond="findPuzzle('BLAST DOOR 1').outcome === 'CLOSED'">, which is sealed off with a thick, metal blast door</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You turn left from TUNNEL 2.</s> <s>The tunnel leads to a giant cave with a LAKE in the middle.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>At the other end of the cave is a SIGN, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on the wall.</s> <s>On the left side of the cave are several HOOKS.</s> <s>The tunnel behind you comes to a crossroads.</s> <s>Directly behind you is TUNNEL 1.</s> <s>Behind you to the right is TUNNEL 3<if cond="findPuzzle('BLAST DOOR 1').outcome === 'CLOSED'">, which is sealed off with a thick, metal blast door</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You turn right from TUNNEL 3.</s> <s>The tunnel leads to a giant cave with a LAKE in the middle.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>At the other end of the cave is a SIGN, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on the wall.</s> <s>On the left side of the cave are several HOOKS.</s> <s>The tunnel behind you comes to a crossroads.</s> <s>Directly behind you is TUNNEL 1.</s> <s>Behind you to the left is TUNNEL 2.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You emerge from the UNDERWATER HOLE.</s> <s>You look around.</s> <s>You're in a giant cave with a LAKE in the middle, which you are currently swimming in.</s> <s>The cave is dimly lit with lanterns on the walls.</s> <s>On the back wall of the cave is a SIGN, as well as a CAMERA and MONITOR mounted on the wall.</s> <s>On the left side of the cave are several HOOKS.</s> <s>Behind you, the cave narrows into a tunnel.</s> <s>It's a short, straight path that comes to a crossroads.</s> <s>Straight ahead is TUNNEL 1.</s> <s>To the right is TUNNEL 2.</s> <s>To the left is TUNNEL 3<if cond="findPuzzle('BLAST DOOR 1').outcome === 'CLOSED'">, which is sealed off with a thick, metal blast door</if>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You dive deep into an underwater cavern from the LAKE.</s> <s>It's incredibly dark, but you can see a faint light at the end of the cavern.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You jump into an underwater cavern from the SURFACE.</s> <s>It's incredibly dark, but you can see a faint light at the other end of the cavern.</s></desc>
soundproof, inside, mountain, video monitoring, audio monitoring, audio surveilled, secret

<desc><s>You enter through the DOOR and find yourself in a fairly large room made entirely of reinforced steel.</s> <s>The first thing you notice is an elaborate COMMAND STATION at the back of the room with hundreds of small MONITORS on the wall above it.</s> <s>On the left side of the room are a BED, an OVEN, a COUNTER, and a REFRIGERATOR.</s> <s>On the right side of the room are a STALL, a SHOWER, a WASHER, and a DRYER.</s> <s>Immediately to the left of the door is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>Immediately to the right of the door is a COFFIN.</s><if cond="this.lock(game, 0); this.exit[0].dest.lock(game, 2); findPuzzle('STALAGMITES', 'cave-9').unsolve(null, game, null, null, null, false); findPuzzle('LOCK', 'command-center').unsolve(null, game, null, null, null, false); false">A</if></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 1 into what seems to be an old dusty library, with shelves looming overhead.</s> <s>The FLOOR is some sort of light wood that seems to be rotting in some places.</s> <s>In front of you is the FRONT DESK, and a LIBRARY CART stands to the left of it.</s> <s>To your right is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>There are <if cond="game.var = findEvent('POSTER SHREDDED').ongoing; game.var === false">4 POSTERS</if><if cond="game.var === true">3 POSTERS and a CREVICE</if> on each of the four walls, as well as a group of 3 DESKS and 3 CHAIRS towards the center of the room.</s> <s>There is a large CEILING FAN directly over this cluster of desks.</s> <s>To the right of them is a single COUCH.</s> <s>If you follow the signs, you can explore the SHELVES.</s> <s>DOOR 2 is directly across from you, all the way across the library.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 2 into what seems to be an old dusty library, with shelves looming overhead.</s> <s>In front of you is a group of 3 DESKS and 3 CHAIRS towards the center of the room.</s> <s>There is a large CEILING FAN directly over this cluster of desks.</s> <s>To the left of them is a single COUCH.</s> <s>There are <if cond="game.var = findEvent('POSTER SHREDDED').ongoing; game.var === false">4 POSTERS</if><if cond="game.var === true">3 POSTERS and a CREVICE</if> on each of the four walls.</s> <s>If you follow the signs, you can explore the SHELVES.</s> <s>Towards the entrance, you see the FRONT DESK and the LIBRARY CART, as well as a TRASH CAN standing near DOOR 1.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and on the wall above the door across from you is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the BOTTOM of a very steep staircase.</s> <s>About halfway up on the right wall is a MONITOR.</s> <s>There is a door at the TOP of the staircase, above which is a CAMERA mounted on the wall.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the TOP of a very steep staircase.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a CAMERA.</s> <s>About halfway down on the left wall is a MONITOR.</s> <s>There is a door at the BOTTOM of the staircase.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the metal DOOR built into the mountain.</s> <if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === true"><s>Snowflakes gently fall from the cloudy sky above.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === true"><s>You're immediately greeted by a blizzard blowing snow at you at a high speed.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('SNOW').ongoing === false && findEvent('BLIZZARD').ongoing === false"><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === false && (findEvent('SUNRISE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSHINE').ongoing === true || findEvent('SUNSET').ongoing === true)"><s>Your eyes take a minute to adjust to the sunlight.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('OVERCAST').ongoing === true && findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === false"><s>The sky above is covered by thick, light gray clouds.</s></if><if cond="findEvent('NIGHT').ongoing === true"><s>You breathe in the crisp, chilly nighttime air.</s></if></if> <s>You find yourself on a flattened peak of the mountain.</s> <s>In place of what would be rock is a large landing pad with a circle surrounding a giant letter H.</s> <s>Parked on it is a small HELICOPTER.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step out of the HELICOPTER onto a flattened peak of the mountain.</s> <s>In place of what would be rock is a large landing pad with a circle surrounding a giant letter H.</s> <s>Built into the side of the mountain is a metal DOOR.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above it are a CAMERA and MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 6, returning to the dungeon.</s> <s>There is a SIGN posted on the door you just came from.</s> <s>Just ahead of you are DOOR 5 to the left and DOOR 4 to the right.</s> <s>Further down the hall are DOOR 3 to the left and DOOR 2 to the right.</s> <s>All the way at the other end of the hall is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Hung on the ceiling is a CAMERA and mounted on the right wall is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR.</s> <s>The floor in this room is cold and gray, as are the walls.</s> <s>To your right, you see a SIGN on the wall.</s> <s>Scattered throughout the room are various objects: There is a large BRAZEN BULL in the center of the room and an IRON MAIDEN to the left, near the wall.</s> <s>Towards the back wall is THE RACK and a WATERBOARDER.</s> <s>Propped up against the right corner is what seems to be a CRUCIFIX.</s> <s>In the center of the room, right next to the bull, is a TABLE.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a fairly empty room.</s> <if cond="game.var = findPuzzle('LOCK', 'incinerator').solved; game.var === false"><s>Stretching from wall to wall is a GRATE, which is fitted with a LOCK in the middle.</s></if><if cond="game.var === true"><s>Scrunched up against the left and right walls are two ends of a GRATE, which is fitted with a LOCK.</s></if> <s>In the back of the room is an INCINERATOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling behind the grate is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You climb out of the INCINERATOR.</s> <if cond="game.var = findPuzzle('LOCK', 'incinerator').solved; game.var === false"><s>Stretching from wall to wall is a GRATE, which is fitted with a LOCK in the middle.</s></if><if cond="game.var === true"><s>Scrunched up against the left and right walls are two ends of a GRATE, which is fitted with a LOCK.</s></if> <s>On the other side of the room is a DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling behind the grate is a CAMERA and hung on the wall above the door is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You fall inside the INCINERATOR.</s> <s>You find yourself in a cramped, tiny chamber, the floor covered in ashes.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR.</s> <s>The floor in this room is cold and gray, as are the walls.</s> <s>You immediately notice the SUITS OF ARMOR along the back wall.</s> <s>The left wall is covered in SHIELDS.</s> <s>Several HOOKS are built into the right wall, on which many different weapons are hung.</s> <s>There is a large TABLE in the center of the room.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from the DOOR.</s> <s>The floor in this room is cold and gray, as are the walls.</s> <s>There's little to see, aside from an OPERATING CHAIR in the middle of the room, a CART next to it, and some CABINETS in the back of the room.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR<if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC QUIET').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very quietly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC LOUD').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song very loudly</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC DEAFENING').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song so loud it drowns out everything else</if><if cond="findEvent('CIRCUS MUSIC MAX').ongoing === true">, which is playing an annoying song that you can no longer hear</if>.</s></desc>

You find yourself at the BEGINNING of an incredibly long stretch of floor, absolute nothingness on either side of you. You can't even see the END, but if there's treasure there, then...
A giant meatball with a face appears in the distant void, slowly approaching you from the side. Its arrival is accompanied by a song. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sJOTRbfNbNo

<desc><s>You step back onto the long stretch of floor.</s> <s>Absolute nothingness surrounds you to the left and right.</s> <s>You can't see the BEGINNING, but the meatball man is nowhere to be seen.</s> <s>You can take it easy on the way back.</s></desc>
<desc><s>You finally reach the end of the TRACK.</s> <s>You find yourself in a small room.</s> <s>In the center of the room is a gold PEDESTAL.</s> <s>On the back wall is a HOOK.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 1 into a grand foyer.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a semicircle.</s> <s>Against the middle of the back wall, half of a thick pillar juts out, dividing the wall in two.</s> <s>A SIGN is hung on the pillar.</s> <s>On the left side of the wall is DOOR 2.</s> <s>On the right side is DOOR 3.</s> <s>All of the wall space surrounding the doors is taken up by a TIMELINE.</s> <s>Immediately to your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 2 into a grand foyer.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a semicircle.</s> <s>Against the middle of the wall behind you, half of a thick pillar juts out, dividing the wall in two.</s> <s>A SIGN is hung on the pillar.</s> <s>On the left side of the pillar is DOOR 3.</s> <s>Nearly all of the wall behind you is covered by a TIMELINE.</s> <s>Across from you is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Just to the left of it is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door across from you is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 3 into a grand foyer.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a semicircle.</s> <s>Against the middle of the wall behind you, half of a thick pillar juts out, dividing the wall in two.</s> <s>A SIGN is hung on the pillar.</s> <s>On the right side of the pillar is DOOR 2.</s> <s>Nearly all of the wall behind you is covered by a TIMELINE.</s> <s>Across from you is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Just to the left of it is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[3].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door across from you is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in a grand foyer.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a semicircle.</s> <s>Immediately to your left is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Against the middle of the right wall, half of a thick pillar juts out, dividing the wall in two.</s> <s>A SIGN is hung on the pillar.</s> <s>On the left side of the wall is DOOR 2.</s> <s>On the right side is DOOR 3.</s> <s>All of the wall space surrounding the doors is taken up by a TIMELINE.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door next to you is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc>You enter from DOOR 1 into a small banquet hall.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>A long BANQUET TABLE stretches diagonally across the room.</s> <s>A MURAL is painted on the ceiling.</s> <s>On the wall to your right is DOOR 2.</s> <s>Across from you is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[2].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[2].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a CAMERA and above the other door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc>You enter from DOOR 2 into a small banquet hall.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>A long BANQUET TABLE stretches diagonally across the room.</s> <s>A MURAL is painted on the ceiling.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Just to your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[2].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[2].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR and above the other door is a CAMERA.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in a small banquet hall.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>A long BANQUET TABLE stretches diagonally across the room.</s> <s>A MURAL is painted on the ceiling.</s> <s>On the wall across from you is DOOR 1.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above it is a CAMERA.</s> <s>To your left is DOOR 2, above which is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 1 into a gallery.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The curved wall is covered in large PAINTINGS.</s> <s>In front of the paintings are short barriers with red velvet ropes to prevent the viewers from getting too close.</s> <s>Against the straight walls are a few BENCHES to rest on.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is DOOR 2.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You enter from DOOR 2 into a gallery.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The curved wall is covered in large PAINTINGS.</s> <s>In front of the paintings are short barriers with red velvet ropes to prevent the viewers from getting too close.</s> <s>Against the straight walls are a few BENCHES to rest on.</s> <s>On the wall to your right is DOOR 1.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the other door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into an art studio.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are white.</s> <s>In the center of the room is a collection of STOOLS and EASELS.</s> <s>Next to the door are a DRYING RACK and a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>Across the section of room to your right is a long curved COUNTER.</s> <s>On the wall to your left is a collection of PAINTINGS.</s> <s>To your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 3</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 3.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in an art studio.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are white.</s> <s>In the center of the room is a collection of STOOLS and EASELS.</s> <s>Next to the door are a DRYING RACK and a TRASH CAN. Across the curved section of the room is a long COUNTER. On the other wall is a collection of PAINTINGS.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is a DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a study.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>Against the wall on either side of you are two tall BOOKSHELVES.</s> <s>There are two cozy-looking CHAIRS facing a short TABLE in the middle of the room.</s> <s>Against the other straight wall is a DESK.</s> <s>Along the curved wall is <if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">a staircase leading to FLOOR 1</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">a shallow inset in the floor</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend the staircase from FLOOR 1.</s> <s>Standing at the top of the staircase, you find yourself in a study.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>There are two cozy-looking CHAIRS facing a short TABLE in the middle of the room.</s> <s>Against the back wall is a DESK.</s> <s>Against the wall to your right are two tall BOOKSHELVES, with a DOOR inbetween them.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a room filled with weapons.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>There are several HOOKS on the wall to your right, as well as an ARMOR STAND in front of it.</s> <s>There's a SHELF in the middle of the room, and a CANNON not too far from it.</s> <s>Along the curved wall is <if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">a staircase leading to FLOOR 1</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">a shallow inset in the floor</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend the staircase from FLOOR 1.</s> <s>Standing at the top of the staircase, you find yourself in a room filled with weapons.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>There are several HOOKS on the back wall, as well as an ARMOR STAND in front of it.</s> <s>There's a SHELF in the middle of the room, and a CANNON not too far from it.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your right is a DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into some kind of war planning room.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a round TABLE, on top of which is a CHEST.</s> <s>The wall to your left is entirely covered with a WORLD MAP.</s> <s>To your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 3</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 3.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in some kind of war planning room.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a round TABLE, on top of which is a CHEST.</s> <s>The back wall is entirely covered with a WORLD MAP.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is a DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a wine cellar.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The right wall is entirely covered with SHELVES.</s> <s>There is a round TABLE in the middle of the room, surrounded by four chairs.</s> <s>Along the curved wall is <if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">a staircase leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">a shallow inset in the floor</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend the staircase from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>Standing at the top of the staircase, you find yourself in a wine cellar.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The back wall is entirely covered with SHELVES.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your right is a DOOR.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a large bedroom.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are a light pink color.</s> <s>At your feet is the edge of a RUG.</s> <s>Sitting on top of that rug is a BED, with a LOVESEAT at the foot of it.</s> <s>Directly in front of that loveseat is a TV STAND with a TELEVISION on it.</s> <s>To your right is a large DRESSER, and not far from that is a CLOSET.</s> <s>There is a PAINTING hanging on the wall above the bed.</s> <s>To the left of the bed is a tall SHELF, and to the right of the bed is a FERN.</s> <s>Theres also a weird TOY SUBMARINE in the corner of the room, almost hidden away from view.</s> <s>To your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 4</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 4.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in a large bedroom.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are a light pink color.</s> <s>At your feet is the edge of a RUG.</s> <s>Sitting on top of that rug is a BED, with a LOVESEAT at the foot of it.</s> <s>Directly in front of that loveseat is a TV STAND with a TELEVISION on it.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is a DOOR.</s> <s>To the right of it is a large DRESSER, and not far from that is a CLOSET.</s> <s>There is a PAINTING hanging on the wall above the bed.</s> <s>To the left of the bed is a tall SHELF, and to the right of the bed is a FERN.</s> <s>Theres also a weird TOY SUBMARINE in the corner of the room, almost hidden away from view.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a large bathroom.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are white.</s> <s>Since this is a bathroom, you see a TOILET and a SHOWER.</s> <s>There is a COUNTERTOP along the left wall with a built-in SINK and a MEDICINE CABINET on the wall above it.</s> <s>Built around the pillar is a large BATHTUB.</s> <s>Just to the left of the door is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>To your right is a staircase curving up the wall<if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">, leading to FLOOR 4</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">, which just leads into the ceiling</if>.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step down the staircase from FLOOR 4.</s> <s>Standing at the bottom of the staircase, you find yourself in a large bathroom.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>The walls are white.</s> <s>Since this is a bathroom, you see a TOILET and a SHOWER.</s> <s>There is a COUNTERTOP along the back wall with a built-in SINK and a MEDICINE CABINET on the wall above it.</s> <s>Built around the pillar is a large BATHTUB.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your left is a DOOR.</s> <s>Just to the right of the door is a TRASH CAN.</s> <s>Mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You step through the DOOR into a room for children.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>Against the right wall is a BUNK BED, with two DRESSERS on either side of it.</s> <s>Several things to play with are scattered all around the room, including BLOCKS, a ROCKING HORSE, and a SLIDE.</s> <s>Hung on the wall behind you are several DRAWINGS.</s> <s>Along the curved wall is <if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === true">a staircase leading to FLOOR 2</if><if cond="this.exit[1].unlocked === false">a shallow inset in the floor</if>.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door you just came from is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend the staircase from FLOOR 2.</s> <s>Standing at the top of the staircase, you find yourself in a room for children.</s> <s>The room is shaped like a quarter of a circle, with part of a thick pillar in the corner.</s> <s>Against the back wall is a BUNK BED, with two DRESSERS on either side of it.</s> <s>Scattered all around the room are several things to play with, including BLOCKS, a ROCKING HORSE, and a SLIDE.</s> <s>In the middle of the wall to your right is a DOOR, with a number of DRAWINGS hung on the wall surrounding it.</s> <s>On the ceiling in the middle of the room is a CAMERA and mounted on the wall above the door is a MONITOR.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend from STAIRS 1.</s> <s>You find yourself in a completely circular room.</s> <s>All of the walls are covered with SCREENS.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a thick pillar, at the base of which is a PODIUM.</s> <s>Mounted on the pillar are two CAMERAS and a MONITOR.</s> <s>At the other end of the room is another staircase down: STAIRS 2.</s></desc>

<desc><s>You ascend from STAIRS 2.</s> <s>You find yourself in a completely circular room.</s> <s>All of the walls are covered with SCREENS.</s> <s>In the middle of the room is a thick pillar, at the base of which is a PODIUM.</s> <s>Mounted on the pillar are two CAMERAS and a MONITOR.</s> <s>At the other end of the room is another staircase down: STAIRS 1.</s></desc>
